message.entry: Expected input to be a scalar, vector or matrix of intensity values.
Expected input to be a floating point scalar, vector or matrix of intensity values.
When the Method property is ''Lucas-Kanade'' and the TemporalGradientFilter property is ''Difference filter [-1 1]'', the number of rows and columns in the input image must be greater than 4.
Must have at least two input arguments or no input argument.
Input frame size must remain unchanged.
Input frame data type must remain unchanged.
plot is not supported in code generation.
Velocity components must have the same size.
Velocity components must have the same class.
Variable-sized image is not supported. Image must be fixed-sized.
The Color value must be a 1-by-3 vector, string, or character array.
